programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: BLACKPINK IN YOUR AERA! Let’s enjoy BLACKPINK’s powerful Performance Videos.

programme.title: W-LOG
programme.desc: W-LOG is a reality show featuring behind episodes WINNER’s performance tours in seven cities–Seattle, San Francisco, LA, Dallas, Chicago, Toronto, and NY–across North America. This show depicts everyday life in the form of Vlog (Video + Blog) by WINNER members.

programme.title: W-LOG
programme.desc: WINNER-LOG: HOONY'S BUCKET LIST - SEOUL TOUR / LET’S GO CAMPING WITH MINO / WELCOME TO YOON’S TOUR -TAROT READINGS FOR YOON'S 2022

programme.title: W-LOG
programme.desc: 4 different W-Log Relay Cam With WINNER

programme.title: YG MV Special
programme.desc: A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original performance videos of the K-Pop artists (BLACKPINK, WINNER, AKMU, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment

programme.title: YG MV Special
programme.sub-title: YG MV Special - Performance Clip Part.1
programme.desc: A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original performance videos of the K-Pop artists (BLACKPINK, WINNER, AKMU, iKON, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: Shining SOLO
programme.desc: PART 1 of 'Shining Solo' begins. The gates of TREASURE CASTLE finally swing open welcoming JIHOON JUNKYU YOON JAE HYUK ASAHI and HARUTO with hearts pounding and minds racing. As the moment to choose their Mr. TREASURE approaches women start entering the castle one by one...

programme.title: Shining SOLO
programme.desc: Who will be Mr. TREASURE of DAY 1? As the clock strikes midnight the women leave a jewel for the man they find most charming and a voice recorder for the man who they think could’ve done better disappearing into the night one by one... A night filled with shock and surprise as the results are revealed.

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: AKMU COLLABORATION ALBUM [NEXT EPISODE] Special With Lee Sun Hee / IU / Beenzino / Zion.T / Crush / choi Jung Hoon of JANNABI / Sam Kim

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: TREASURE's digital single 'LAST NIGHT' is a vibrant dance track infused with warmth and youthful energy.

programme.title: Siblings Next Door
programme.sub-title: AKMU - Siblings Next Door: S1 E1
programme.desc: [Even just with our glances, we understand] - A cutting-edge test to check the bond between siblings,Starting the sibling compatibility test! / [Last Rice Paddy Last Rice Field] - AKMU received a low sibling score, Let's serve each other as the Master and Servant for a day !

programme.title: Siblings Next Door
programme.sub-title: AKMU - Siblings Next Door: S1 E2
programme.desc: [The manager who made my heart race] - Trying out as CHANHYUK's one-day manager

programme.title: YG MV Special
programme.desc: A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original music videos of the K-Pop artists (BLACKPINK, WINNER, AKMU, iKON, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK: S1 E0
programme.desc: The members officially confirm their comeback. Each member talks about what they would like to show to Blinks through this reality show and the title for the show is chosen. The members give out their comeback spoilers.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: Lisa takes Blinks to a dance rehearsal while Jennie goes shopping and attends the Jentle Home opening event. Rosé and Jisoo visit a pottery place and show Blinks their crafts.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: Exclusive behind-the-scenes footage of the How You Like That music video. The members talk about their parts in the music video and have fun backstage. Footage from the comeback live show and the press conference is shown, in which we see the members answering questions and reacting to the music video.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: The members take on different roles at BLACKPINK Inc. Jisoo (Position: New Employee; Expertise: cleaning, coffee orders, and making others laugh), Rosé (Position: Manager; Expertise: English, sticking pp), Lisa (Position: Senior Manager; Expertise: lived overseas but has slow eyes) & Jennie (Position: Director; Expertise: got promoted quickly) ChuLiChaeng try their best to impress Director Jennie for being promoted.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: The members play a telepathy game to get items for their meal. They can choose an ingredient, but they cannot tell the other members what they have chosen; they have to guess what the previous member chose through telepathy.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: The members talk about their training days and the hardships that they experienced. Rosé plays her guitar, and they sing "Price Tag," "Lonely," and "You & I" together as they did during their training days.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: At the YG Entertainment facility, the members celebrated their fourth anniversary as a group, preparing a special dance of the choreography of "How You Like That" dressed as characters from the movie Frozen. After a raffle, Rosé had to dress up as Princess Anna, Jisoo as Elsa, Lisa as Olaf, and Jennie as Kristoff. Then, the renowned South Korean magician Choi Hyun Woo was invited, who performed a series of magic tricks on the members.
